data.title: Clay County
data.text:
Damage Report Update

If your property received damage from flooding this summer, please submit damage details to our office of your affected parcel. Locate your parcel using Real Estate Search option from this website and click on the Damage Report link. The information received will be reviewed for the 2025 assessment year taxes payable 2026/2027. Thank you for your assistance.

Public Information Disclaimer:

The Clay County Assessor may provide property information to the public "as is" without warranty of any kind, expressed or implied. Assessed values are subject to change by the assessor, Board of Review or State Equalization processes. Additionally, statutory exemptions may affect the taxable values. In no event will the assessor be liable to anyone for damages arising from the use of the property data. You assume responsibility for the selection of data to achieve your intended results, and for the installation and use of the results obtained from the property data.
